    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    Facet ProductPrice_Shared

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:ProductPrice_Shared

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ProductPriceShared xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" feesIncludedInd="true" gratuityIncludedInd="true" taxExcludedInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3">
    <ota2-0400:PriceDetail description="Example String Value" maxQuantity="2345" percentage="10" quantity="1234" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000">
        <ota2-0400:Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</ota2-0400:Total>
        <ota2-0400:ChargeUnit>Per unit</ota2-0400:ChargeUnit>
    </ota2-0400:PriceDetail>
    <ota2-0400:Taxes>
        <ota2-0400:Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</ota2-0400:Total>
        <ota2-0400:Tax sequenceNbr="Example String Value" taxExcludedInd="true">
            <ota2-0400:AmountSummary description="Example String Value" percentage="10" quantity="3456" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000">
                <ota2-0400:Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</ota2-0400:Total>
                <ota2-0400:ChargeUnit>Per order</ota2-0400:ChargeUnit>
            </ota2-0400:AmountSummary>
            <ota2-0400:EffectiveExpire effective="2011-01-24" expire="2011-07-04" expireDateExclusiveInd="true"/>
            <ota2-0400:TaxType_Enum>Assessment/license tax</ota2-0400:TaxType_Enum>
        </ota2-0400:Tax>
    </ota2-0400:Taxes>
    <ota2-0400:Fee taxExcludedInd="true">
        <ota2-0400:PriceDetail description="Example String Value" maxQuantity="1234" percentage="10" quantity="4567" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000">
            <ota2-0400:Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</ota2-0400:Total>
            <ota2-0400:ChargeUnit>Per tray</ota2-0400:ChargeUnit>
        </ota2-0400:PriceDetail>
        <ota2-0400:FeeType>Adult rollaway fee</ota2-0400:FeeType>
        <ota2-0400:Description name="paragraph name" number="1234">
            <ota2-0400:Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</ota2-0400:Text>
            <ota2-0400:Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="3456" sort="2345" version="Example String Value">
                <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
                <ota2-0400:ImageRef>image_1</ota2-0400:ImageRef>
                <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</ota2-0400:URL>
                <ota2-0400:Details applicableEnd="2011-01-24" applicableStart="2011-12-05" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</ota2-0400:Details>
                <ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
                    <ota2-0400:FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="4567" subTitle="Example String Value"/>
                </ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription>
                <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-07-04">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
                <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                    <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
                    <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                    <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
                </ota2-0400:Email>
                <ota2-0400:Dimensions height="2345" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="1234"/>
                <ota2-0400:File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="3456"/>
                <ota2-0400:Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
            </ota2-0400:Image>
            <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</ota2-0400:URL>
            <ota2-0400:ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="2345" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
            <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" purge="2011-12-05">2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
        </ota2-0400:Description>
        <ota2-0400:FeeDetailAdditionalPerson feeAppliesAfter="2345" maxAge="4567" maxNumberAdditional="1234" minAge="3456"/>
    </ota2-0400:Fee>
    <ProductRef>a111</ProductRef>
    <Gratuity mandatoryInd="true">
        <ota2-0400:AmountOrPercentAmount>
            <ota2-0400:CurrencyAmount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</ota2-0400:CurrencyAmount>
        </ota2-0400:AmountOrPercentAmount>
    </Gratuity>
</ProductPriceShared>

      {
  "ProductPriceShared" : {
    "taxExcludedInd" : true,
    "feesIncludedInd" : true,
    "gratuityIncludedInd" : true,
    "Price" : {
      "@type" : "PriceDetail",

    },

        "currencyCode" : "USD",
        "minorUnit" : 2
      },
      "Tax" : [ {
        "@type" : "Tax",
        "sequenceNbr" : "Example String Value",
        "taxExcludedInd" : true,
        "AmountSummary" : {
          "unitPrice" : 100.0000,

          "quantity" : 3456,
          "percentage" : 10,

          "value" : "Assessment/license tax"

      } ]
    },

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Price
        The details of the price of the product.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Price
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Taxes
        Taxes for this product.
        Details
        Type Taxes
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Fee
        Fees related to this product.
        Details
        Type Fee
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        ProductRef
        Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.
        Details
        Type Product
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Gratuity
        Gratiuity information.
        Details
        Type Gratuity
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        taxExcludedInd
        When present and true, tax is excluded from the price.
        feesIncludedInd
        When present and true, fees are included.
        gratuityIncludedInd
        When present and true, the gratuity is included in the price of this product.
